lead_paragraph: The president’s announcement that the United States was “fully lifting” the decades-old ban on lethal weapons sales came at a news conference in Hanoi.

byline.contributor: Jane Perlez contributed reporting from Beijing, and Nicola Clark from Paris.

headline.print_headline: Obama Lifts Vietnam Arms Embargo, a Vestige of War
headline.main: Vietnam Arms Embargo to Be Fully Lifted, Obama Says in Hanoi

snippet: The president’s announcement that the United States was “fully lifting” the decades-old ban on lethal weapons sales came at a news conference in Hanoi.
abstract: Pres Obama, during diplomatic visit to Vietnam, announces lifting of decades-old United States ban on sales of lethal military equipment to country--one of last legal vestiges of Vietnam War.
